title: Requires the New York state energy research and development authority to submit an annual report detailing energy efficiency portfolio standard and approving program
summary: Requires the New York state energy research and development authority to submit an annual report detailing energy efficiency portfolio standard and approving programs.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          215

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen. MAZIARZ -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on  Energy  and  Telecommuni-
         cations

       AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the
         New  York state energy research and development authority to establish
         the energy efficiency portfolio standard and approving programs

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  public  authorities  law  is amended by adding a new
    2  section 1873 to read as follows:
    3    S 1873. EXAMINATION AND REPORTING OF ENERGY EFFICIENCY  GRANT  RECIPI-
    4  ENTS; REQUIRED.  THE AUTHORITY SHALL SUBMIT TO THE GOVERNOR, THE SPEAKER
    5  OF THE ASSEMBLY, THE TEMPORARY PRESIDENT OF THE SENATE, THE CHAIR OF THE
    6  STATE ENERGY PLANNING BOARD, THE CHAIR OF THE ASSEMBLY ENERGY COMMITTEE,
    7  THE  RANKING MINORITY MEMBER OF THE ASSEMBLY ENERGY COMMITTEE, THE CHAIR
    8  OF THE SENATE  ENERGY  AND  TELECOMMUNICATIONS  COMMITTEE,  THE  RANKING
    9  MINORITY  MEMBER  OF THE SENATE ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMITTEE,
   10  THE CHAIR OF THE  ASSEMBLY  CORPORATIONS,  AUTHORITIES  AND  COMMISSIONS
   11  COMMITTEE,  THE  RANKING  MINORITY  MEMBER OF THE ASSEMBLY CORPORATIONS,
   12  AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS COMMITTEE, THE CHAIR OF  THE  SENATE  CORPO-
   13  RATIONS,  AUTHORITIES  AND  COMMISSIONS  COMMITTEE, THE RANKING MINORITY
   14  MEMBER OF THE SENATE CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS COMMITTEE
   15  AND THE CHAIR OF THE RENEWABLE ENERGY SUBCOMMITTEE  IN  THE  ASSEMBLY  A
   16  COPY OF THE ANNUAL REPORT THE AUTHORITY IS REQUIRED TO PRODUCE TO COMPLY
   17  WITH  THE  PUBLIC SERVICE COMMISSION ORDER ESTABLISHING THE ENERGY EFFI-
   18  CIENCY PORTFOLIO STANDARD AND APPROVING PROGRAMS.
   19    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01220-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the New York state energy research and development authority to establish the energy efficiency portfolio standard and approving programs
